```{r setup 1, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(here)
library(colorblindr)
library(gghighlight)
library(forcats)
library(ggrepel)
library(gt)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(reactable)
library(plotly)
library(SCVA)
library(patchwork)
theme_set(theme_minimal(15) +
            theme(legend.position = "bottom",
                  panel.grid.major.x = element_line(color = "gray60"),
                  panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
                  panel.grid.major.y = element_blank())
          )

brief_self <- import(here("data", "KEAM_brief_self.xlsx"),
               setclass = "tbl_df") 

brief_informant <- import(here("data", "KEAM_brief_informant.xlsx"),
               setclass = "tbl_df") 

```

```{r, include=FALSE}
make_color_pal <- function(colors, bias = 1) {
  get_color <- colorRamp(colors, bias = bias)
  function(x) rgb(get_color(x), maxColorValue = 255)
}

good_color <- make_color_pal(c("#ffffff", "#f2fbd2", "#c9ecb4", "#93d3ab", "#35b0ab"), bias = 2)
seq(0.1, 0.9, length.out = 12)
good_color(seq(0.1, 0.9, length.out = 12))
seq(0.1, 0.9, length.out = 12) %>% 
  good_color() %>% 
  scales::show_col()
```

## BRIEF-A {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

### Self-Report

```{r, include=FALSE}
brief_tbl <- function(df) {
  df %>% 
  reactable(
    columns = list(
      `Scale/Index` = colDef(align = "center"),
      `Raw Score` = colDef(name = "Raw Score",
                           align = "center"),
      `T-Score` = colDef(name = "T-Score",
                         align = "center"),
      `Percentile Rank` = colDef(name = "Percentile Rank",
                                align = "center")),
    pagination = FALSE,
    striped = TRUE,
    outlined = TRUE,
    compact = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE,
    bordered = TRUE,
    #searchable = TRUE,
    height = 600,
    width = 500)
}
brief_tbl(brief_self)
brief_self_tbl <- brief_self %>% 
  reactable(
    columns = list(
      `Scale/Index` = colDef(align = "center"),
      `Raw Score` = colDef(name = "Raw Score",
                           align = "center"),
      `T-Score` = colDef(name = "T-Score",
                         align = "center",
                         style = function(value) {
                           value
                           normalized <- (value - min(brief_self$`T-Score`)) / (max(brief_self$`T-Score`) - min(brief_self$`T-Score`))
                           color <- good_color(normalized)
                           list(background = color)
                         }),
      `Percentile Rank` = colDef(name = "Percentile Rank",
                                align = "center",
                                style = function(value) {
                           value
                           normalized <- (value - min(brief_self$`Percentile Rank`)) / (max(brief_self$`Percentile Rank`) - min(brief_self$`Percentile Rank`))
                           color <- good_color(normalized)
                           list(background = color)
                         })),
    pagination = FALSE,
    striped = FALSE,
    outlined = TRUE,
    compact = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE,
    bordered = FALSE,
    #searchable = TRUE,
    height = 600,
    width = 500)
```


```{r, include=TRUE, fig.height=8, fig.width=10}
brief_self_tbl
```
